biocontainers.name: tssar
biocontainers.summary: TSSAR is a Web Service for predicting bacterial Transcription Start Sites from dRNA-seq data.

biotools.summary: A tool for automated de novo TSS annotation from dRNA-seq data that respects the statistics of dRNA-seq libraries.

bioschemas.name: TSSAR
bioschemas.summary: A tool for automated de novo TSS annotation from dRNA-seq data that respects the statistics of dRNA-seq libraries.
